Key Match Events: Framber Valdez threw seven no-hit innings for the Astros
Paul DeJong broke up the no-hitter with a two-run homer in the ninth inning
Jose Altuve hit a walk-off double in the ninth inning
Pre-Game Insights: Seth Lugo was working on some adjustments to improve his performance
Lugo was trying to get back in his groove and make quality starts
Post-Match Reflections: Royals manager Matt Quatraro praised Lugo's performance, calling it 'exceptional'
Paul DeJong reflected on his game-changing home run and the team's resolve to fight despite the tough loss
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Royals nearly stole a victory from the Astros, but ultimately lost 3-2
Lugo led the Major Leagues with 179 innings pitched
The Royals were no-hit into the eighth inning before breaking it up with a single by Kyle Isbel
Others: First baseman Vinnie Pasquantino will be out six to eight weeks with a broken thumb
